description: Source code for a Dojo-based Todo list widget, defining the 'Todos' class with methods for managing todo items, routing, and data binding.

classes.name: Todos
classes.description: A Dojo widget class managing a todo list, including routing, data store interactions, and UI state.

methods.name: postMixInProperties
methods.description: Initializes store, sets up routing and computed properties.

methods.name: addTodo
methods.description: Adds a new todo item to the store and updates the list.

methods.name: saveTodo
methods.description: Saves updates to an existing todo item.

methods.name: removeTodo
methods.description: Removes a todo item from the store and list.

methods.name: replaceTodo
methods.description: Replaces an old todo with a new one in the list.

methods.name: markAll
methods.description: Marks all todos as completed or active based on current state.

methods.name: clearCompletedTodos
methods.description: Removes all completed todos from the list.
